text: The 1926 Tour of the Basque Country was the third edition of the Tour of the Basque Country cycle race and was held from 4 August to 8 August 1926. The race started in Bilbao and finished in Las Arenas. The race was won by Nicolas Frantz. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 39" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 39" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 58" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 50" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 20" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 58" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 19' 51" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 19' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 21' 14" |} |} ==References== 1926 Bas
title: 1926 Tour of the Basque Country
